blog.name: crazyintheeast
blog.title: Crazy in the East
blog.description:
My current interests are :Sara Lance, Runaways(especially Karolina and Nico), Supergirl, Lena Luthor(no toxic fans are tolerated here), Pitch Perfect, The Gifted

Things I cover in general :
Jaimie Alexander(Kyle XY forever), Natalie Dormer, Person of Interest, Legends of Tommorow Wheel of Time,Happy ,Endings,Parks and Recreation,Community,Continuum
 Lost Girl, Doctor Who(especially pre Moffat),     Game  of Thrones,Buffy,Disney,Marvel, Korra, Arrow, Elementary , Once Upon a Time .Stargate , Firefly, Warehouse 13 and so on. Plus random weird and pretty stuff. 
Just a warning I post a lot and I am likely to flood your dash with stuff
.Also things I especially like are tagged "awesome". Things I find especially useful or that I would like to use or buy some day are "lifehacks".

I am bored often so feel to ask me whatever you want whenever you want. Also I do gifs sometimes. You can check them under the tag "my gifs"

blog.name: mrdaps
blog.title: Mr. DAPs
blog.description:
Hi there!

I am Mr. DAPs, that guy with the hat that walks around Disneyland. I will mainly be posting some pictures that I have taken that I particularly like here but will occasionally post some other things.

You can read some of my other posts at any or all of the links below:

Blog: mrdaps.com
Website: dapsmagic.com
Twitter: twitter.com/mrdaps
Facebook: facebook.com/misterdaps

Please feel free to add me on any or all of the above links. I look forward to chatting with you and seeing you in the park!

Make it a GREAT day!

-Mr. DAPs

summary: The Past is the Key to the Future in New Captain Marvel TV Spot
title: The Past is the Key to the Future in New Captain Marvel TV Spot
body:
The Past is the Key to the Future in New Captain Marvel TV Spot

Marvel Studios has released a new TV Spot for Captain Marvel. In it, Brie Larson’s Carol Danvers is searching in her past to unlock a current mystery. This will be even more interesting as this movie takes place in the past, compared to all the other movies in the Marvel Cinematic Universe. Many of the clips shown in this TV spot have been seen before but it continues to build anticipation for…

View On WordPress

summary: Captain Marvel: qual è la vera identità del personaggio di Jude Law?
title: Captain Marvel: qual è la vera identità del personaggio di Jude Law?
body:
Captain Marvel: qual è la vera identità del personaggio di Jude Law?

La Marvel potrebbe avere dato un ruolo importante a Jude Law in Captain Marvel del prossimo anno.

Ci sono stati un sacco di avanti e indietro per quanto riguarda la vera identità del ruolo di Jude Law in Captain Marvel. Molti fan hanno supposto dalla storia e dal trailer che stesse giocando la parte di Mar-Vell, è stato anche brevemente etichettato come tale da un sito Disney, ma un…

blog.name: kindaoffkilter
blog.title: kindaoffkilter
blog.description: Started this to follow fanfic of various and Person of Interest in particular, though I have LOTS of randoms randomly. A lot of Marvel, esp Marvel men. I don't know what I'm doing here (feel free to broadly interpret "here"), but maybe if I keep poking buttons something will clue me...Now a lot of political stuff is forefront because holy batshit, things are getting crazy.

summary: Is there an actual psychological explanation for why I always cry watching wonder woman, supergirl or the trailer for captain...
body: Is there an actual psychological explanation for why I always cry watching wonder woman, supergirl or the trailer for captain marvel? I don’t cry when I watch iron man so what gives? Like I get that its a ”joke” or whatever that finally having badass female superheroes makes everyone cry but I literally do cry every time diana appears on screen or I see carol punching that old lady on the bus. Why does that happen???

reblog.comment: Is there an actual psychological explanation for why I always cry watching wonder woman, supergirl or the trailer for captain marvel? I don’t cry when I watch iron man so what gives? Like I get that its a ”joke” or whatever that finally having badass female superheroes makes everyone cry but I literally do cry every time diana appears on screen or I see carol punching that old lady on the bus. Why does that happen???

trail.content_raw: Is there an actual psychological explanation for why I always cry watching wonder woman, supergirl or the trailer for captain marvel? I don’t cry when I watch iron man so what gives? Like I get that its a ”joke” or whatever that finally having badass female superheroes makes everyone cry but I literally do cry every time diana appears on screen or I see carol punching that old lady on the bus. Why does that happen???
trail.content: Is there an actual psychological explanation for why I always cry watching wonder woman, supergirl or the trailer for captain marvel? I don’t cry when I watch iron man so what gives? Like I get that its a ”joke” or whatever that finally having badass female superheroes makes everyone cry but I literally do cry every time diana appears on screen or I see carol punching that old lady on the bus. Why does that happen???

summary: 10 Films I'm Looking Forward To In 2019
title: 10 Films I'm Looking Forward To In 2019
body:
10 Films I’m Looking Forward To In 2019

2018 was a good year for movies. After the desert that was 2016 and 2017, we got a little bit of break this past year. With 2019 looming, it stands to wonder what films are going to go the distance for the upcoming year. Here is my list of 10 Films I’m Looking Forward To In 2019:

Captain Marvel– This newest addition to the Marvel Cinematic Universe has a lot of high expectations. Let’s hope it…

View On WordPress
